name: Meryl Streep
bio: Meryl Streep is widely regarded as one of the greatest actresses of all time. She has received more Academy Award nominations than any other actor or actress in history.

name: Tom Hanks
bio: Tom Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker known for his roles in both comedic and dramatic films. He has won two Academy Awards for his roles in 'Philadelphia' and 'Forrest Gump'.

name: Scarlett Johansson
birthPlace: New York City, New York, USA
bio: Scarlett Johansson is an American actress known for her versatile roles in both action-packed blockbusters and dramatic films. She is also known for her role as Black Widow in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Will Smith
bio: Will Smith is an American actor, producer, and rapper. He became famous for his role in the 1990s television series 'The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' and later established himself as a major movie star.

name: Angelina Jolie
bio: Angelina Jolie is an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian. She has received multiple awards, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for 'Girl, Interrupted'.

name: Brad Pitt
bio: Brad Pitt is an American actor and producer known for his roles in films like 'Fight Club' and 'Once Upon a Time in Hollywood'. He has received multiple accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.
movies: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

name: Johnny Depp
bio: Johnny Depp is an American actor, producer, and musician known for his unconventional and eccentric roles. He became famous for portraying Captain Jack Sparrow in the 'Pirates of the Caribbean' series.
movies: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

name: Emma Stone
bio: Emma Stone is an American actress known for her roles in both comedies and dramas. She won an Academy Award for her role in 'La La Land'.

name: Ryan Reynolds
bio: Ryan Reynolds is a Canadian actor and producer known for his comedic roles in films like 'Deadpool' and 'The Proposal'. He has received numerous awards for his performances.

name: Chris Hemsworth
bio: Chris Hemsworth is an Australian actor best known for playing the role of Thor in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. He has starred in several blockbuster films.

name: Charlize Theron
bio: Charlize Theron is a South African and American actress and producer. She has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for her role in 'Monster'.

name: Keanu Reeves
bio: Keanu Reeves is a Canadian actor, producer, and director best known for his roles in 'The Matrix' series and 'John Wick'. He is widely admired for his humility and generosity.

name: Kate Winslet
bio: Kate Winslet is an English actress known for her roles in both independent and big-budget films. She is famous for her performance in 'Titanic'.
movies: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

name: Morgan Freeman
bio: Morgan Freeman is an American actor, director, and narrator known for his distinctive voice and roles in films such as 'The Shawshank Redemption' and 'Driving Miss Daisy'.

name: Samuel L. Jackson
bio: Samuel L. Jackson is an American actor and film producer known for his roles in the 'Star Wars' franchise, 'Pulp Fiction', and the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Natalie Portman
bio: Natalie Portman is an Israeli-American actress, director, and producer known for her roles in films like 'Black Swan' and 'V for Vendetta'.
movies: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
